pullrequest.title: Use ignition cmake1 in default branch

content.html:
I think this PR will need more thought as the build workspace is now organized differently, and I haven't checked other things, like install locations. This fixes one of the tests:

diff -r 0b4b16c8c656 src/Iface_TEST.cc
--- a/src/Iface_TEST.cc Mon Mar 26 19:20:21 2018 +0200
+++ b/src/Iface_TEST.cc Mon Mar 26 17:12:02 2018 -0300
@@ -229,8 +229,8 @@
   // Qss file with dialog
   {
     // Add test plugin to path
-    auto testBuildPath = std::string(PROJECT_BINARY_PATH) + "/test/";
-    addPluginPath(testBuildPath + "plugins");
+    auto testBuildPath = std::string(PROJECT_BINARY_PATH) + "/lib/";
+    addPluginPath(testBuildPath);

     // Create app
     EXPECT_TRUE(initApp());
